description: HDMI to HDMI cables are designed to carry digital-only signals from a source to a display. Along with this, digital audio is transmitted over the HDMI cable, making it a versatile alternative to DVI. 19-pin design, ferrite rings, gold plated connectors, black cable, 6 feet in length. Perfect for hook-up of HDTV, Digital Cable, DVR, PS3, DVD, Home Theater. Compatible with all brands of electronics. For video resolution of all the following: 480i, 480p, 720i, 720p, 1080i, 1080p. Even works with the new Sony PlayStation 3. Why pay 5 times more at local stores - we offer the same quality design cables at unbeatable online prices! See the over 80 customer reviews of this cable, and read our customer feedback! Full Money Back Warranty on all orders.
title: HDMI 2M (6 Feet) Super High Resolution Cable by Abacus24-7
